author: such as to a stationary residential antenna.  Frequencies in the 17.7-17.8 GHz band would be made available for NGSO operators to transmit signals from fixed sites on Earth back to their satellites. Starlink-owner SpaceX has told the FCC that “timely access to the 17 GHz band is critical to enable satellite operators to meet the growing demand of American consumers for next-generation broadband connectivity wherever they are.” The spectrum already allocated to NGSO operators for fixed-satellite services is limited
